# TakeShape CLI

## Summary

This is the command-line interface for [TakeShape](https://takeshape.io).

## Documentation

https://www.takeshape.io/docs/quickstart/

## Local Development

#### Login with browser
Set your environment variables to point to the correct client and api urls
```shell script
# local
TS_APP_URL=http://takeshape.test:3000 TS_API_ENDPOINT=http://takeshape.test:3001 npx tsg init
```

```shell script
# PR env
TS_APP_URL=https://pr1234.dev.takeshape.io TS_API_ENDPOINT=https://pr1234.api.dev.takeshape.io npx tsg init
```
